title: Past times
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Trevor Lunn and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Presented by Rob Gell, this video looks at Australia’s pre-history with reference to creatures living during the Proterozoic and Phanerozoic eons. One of a series produced in conjunction with Youth/ANZAAS.
